    • Method Detail

      • canHitTheKing

        public boolean canHitTheKing(Point from,
                             Point kingPos,
                             java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> figureGetter)
        Check if a figure of a specific type can hit the king. It only check this not if the figure can reach the position without hitting the king.
        Specified by:
        canHitTheKing in interface IHitKingChecker
        Parameters:
        from - The position where this figure stand
        kingPos - The position where there king from the other player stand
        figureGetter - A function with them the method can get for each position which figure is on this position.
        Returns:
        true if the figure can hit the king
